content: this is a crochet replica of the blue bunny hat worn by liam adrian cornejo ramos a five-year-old taken by ice on january 21 2026 the hat is a basic ribbed beanie that can be adjusted to the size of your head the pattern is free and can be used and adapted by anyone as long as you don t resell the pattern for profit if you are able please consider sending $5 to help affected families in minnesota 1 such as through the immigrant law center of minnesota 2 1 https //www standwithminnesota com/ 2 https //www ilcm org/donate/
